divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my car, and for whatever reason I looked up at the sky and saw what looked like 2 headlights. What caught my attention was the fact that there were no blinking lights on the craft. As I continued driving I noticed it was getting closer. I lost track of it for a couple of minutes, because of some buildings and trees I was driving by. Once I located the object again, I realized it it was taking a strange shape. At one point I thought it was a blimp because of a low-humming sound it was expelling. As I neared my destination, I can make-out a triangular shape, with about 4-6 white lights on each side,and a red light in the center. It continued its path, until it eventually disappeared into the sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Santa Fe Springs
There were no other sightings in Santa Fe Springs on or around March 8th 2006
Summary: Triangular- shaped, white lights on each side, with a Red light in the center
